body: god the hentai took me 20 seconds but the comments kept me busy for 30 minuts😂 the fuck is wrong with you writing essays here?go to some forum like reddit already dummies 😅

Simple as that

I'm more surprises that someone can write 2 paragraphs "roasting" a random meme pic since it's obvious that it's meant to be a funny profile picture which also kinda suit well considering that i use it in a doujin site. While yours is just the "Sad boy" type of profile and still proceed to "roast" me like I'm the hand itself. Never have i ever see someone tries to roast a hand this hard smh.

Is it that you wanted internet attention too? Oh but it's ok for me to keep replying because i "wanted" internet attention. And dude now I'm intentionally look through guro? Bruh. I didn't blacklisted guro and other things because I'm not gonna spend my time listing every tags that i hate then keep blacklisting one by one? Like uh sure enjoy whatever you wanna enjoy in a guro doujin ig. Creativity? Like what? Different ways to torture someone?

Now let me insults you like you keep doing because you can't make out the points. You dumb fucking degenerated bitch trying to look smart over people disliking a guro doujin. I wonder how can someone this fucking ignorant still alive after getting mad at something so fucking common. Makes me pity your parents (if you have one) that they have to raise you after all these years just for you to get offended by people disliking a weird doujin about a boy getting torture. But what can i say,this is probably the best sperm that your dad can produce.

Yes i know you're complaining about the people that come here knowing that this is guro because that's the only thing you've been talking about other than insulting me randomly instead of actually try to understand the points. You fucking retard. ...Wtf is this now,trying to tell me the difference between 2D and real life? Damn bruh you really pulled out another topic that I wasn't even talking about
@No U based

And woow now you're seeing me condemning/threatening people from the arguments. But as far as i can tell,i haven't commented anything harmful in this comment section.

I do hope this will be my last reply over this dumbass argument because i am too lazy to continue and i want the people who just clicked on the doujin able to comment their thoughts/say what they wanna say like before this argument which literally shouldn't be a problem in the first place.
